title: The Trailer for See Imagines a World Without Sight
text: Adding to the growing genre of “grim dystopian future where humans are missing one of their five senses,” See is an Apple TV original that imagines a world gone blind. The drama, starring Jason Momoa and the inimitable Alfre Woodard, is set 600 years in the future after a virus has decimated humankind and rendered the remaining population blind. From what we can tell, the show looks like The 100 meets Bird Box, and will probably feature Jason Momoa doing his own stunts, so that’s fun. Other than that, it is difficult to decipher what exactly is happening in this trailer. But perhaps that’s the point? Perhaps… we are not meant to see this trailer at all?
description: See Trailer featuring Jason Momoa and Alfre Woodard is part of Apple TV’s new slate of original programming.
